questions.question: She was cheated by her friends. Her friends ……………………….. her.
questions.description: Was cheated is the passive form of cheated.

questions.question: The man was bitten by the dog. The dog ………………………. the man.
questions.description: Was bitten is the passive form of bit.

questions.question: She has been promoted. They …………………………….. her.
questions.description: Has been promoted is the passive form of has/have promoted.

questions.question: I was inspired by his speech. His speech …………………………. me.
questions.description: Was inspired is the passive form of inspired.

questions.question: The road is being repaired. They ………………………….. the road.
questions.description: Is being repaired is the passive form of are/is repairing.

questions.question: You will be punished for this. They ……………………………… you.
questions.description: Will be punished is the passive form of will punish.

questions.question: The flowers were being plucked by the child. The child ………………………….. the flowers.
questions.description: Were being plucked is the passive form of were/was plucking.

questions.question: He has been informed of the accident. We …………………………. him of the accident.
questions.description: Has been informed is the passive form of has/have informed.

questions.question: The suspected are being questioned by the police. The police ……………………………… the suspected.
questions.description: Are being questioned is the passive form of is/are questioning.

questions.question: Tables and chairs are made by carpenters. Carpenters ………………………. tables and chairs.
The injured were being treated by the doctors. The doctors ………………………… the injured.
The letter was posted in the morning. I …………………………… the letter in the morning.
questions.description: Was posted is the passive form of posted.
